General.Name: Panaxia Labs Israel Ltd
General.Description: Panaxia Labs Israel Ltd provides pharmaceutical solutions for patients and physicians in Israel and internationally. It offers pharma-grade smokeless cannabis products, such as oral tablets, orodispersible tablets, sublingual tablets, oral oils, sublingual drops, solution for inhalation, pastilles, topicals, suppositories, and cannabis extracts in ethanol under the NAXIVA " PANAXOL, NAXIVA-PANAXOL-ONKO, PANAXIR SENSE, PANAXIR, Axiban, Tikva, Ultra Health, and Salus brands. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Lod, Israel.
